Plot: Set on a Louisiana sugarcane plantation in the 1970s, A Gathering of Old Men is a powerful depiction of racial tensions arising over the death of a Cajun farmer at the hands of a black man.
Characters: Mathu, Candy Marshall, Sheriff Mapes, George "Snookum" Eliot, Jr., Janice "Janey" Robinson, Robert "Chimley" Louis Stevenson Banks, Matthew "Matt" Lincoln Brown, Grant "Cherry" Bello, Cyril "Clatoo" Robillard, Louis "Lou Dimes" Alfred Dimoulin, Joseph "Rufe" Seaberry, Thomas "Sully" Vincent Sullivan, Jacques "Tee Jack" Thibeaux, Albert "Rooster" Jackson, Sidney "Coot" Brooks, Horace "Sharp" Thompson, Luke Will, Gil Boutan, Beau Boutan
